animeDescription: This is the story about how Dubus, Lafiel's father, and Plakia after an adventure on a mysterious, abandoned spaceship decided to have a daughter together and why Dubus gave her the name Lafiel. (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Seikai no Danshou', 'Sequel: Seikai no Monshou']
